attributes.action: Set up a justice review of the Government actions complicit in  the deaths of 655,000 Iraqis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Please remove the reference to a website from the petition. There are also a number of similar petitions online, including this one:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/iraq-war/
reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
